thread.title: Saints QB Brees to miss Sunday's game at Carolina
thread.title_full: Saints QB Brees to miss Sunday's game at Carolina

author: The Associated Press
title: Saints QB Brees to miss Sunday's game at Carolina
text:
Gerald Herbert Saints QB Brees to miss Sunday's game at Carolina 
New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees talks to the media regarding his shoulder injury from last Sunday's game against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, during a news conference at their NFL football training facility in Metairie, La., Wednesday, Sept. 23, 2015. (AP Photo/Gerald Herbert) Posted: Friday, September 25, 2015 2:26 pm Saints QB Brees to miss Sunday's game at Carolina Associated Press | 
METAIRIE, La. â€” Drew Brees will be sidelined for New Orleans' game at Carolina on Sunday, Saints coach Sean Payton said Friday. 
The star quarterback is battling a bruised rotator cuff in his right (throwing) shoulder. Payton said the velocity on Brees' passes is not what he needs, so Luke McCown will start for the Saints, who have dropped their first two games. It will be McCown's first start since joining New Orleans in 2013. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
